paper_abstract: Although many works have been done in recent years for the designing Fuzzy-Neural Networks (FNN) from input-output data, the results concerning how to analyze the performance of some methods from a rigorous mathematical point of view are somewhat few. In this paper, the approximation bound for the Table Look-up Scheme with the Bell Membership Function is established. The detailed formulas of the error bound between the nonlinear function to be approximated and the FNN system designed based on the input-output data are derived.
paper_title: Approximation accuracy of table look-up scheme for fuzzy-neural networks with bell membership function
